With the land around our first city developing nicely, we can fine tune our production techniques.
Having discovered another continent we realize there is a wide world of trading opportunities.
Your soldiers hope your victory over a Barbarian Outpost is the start of a long line of military successes.
Bringing our first district online has proven the value of conscripting workers for state projects.
The growing number of citizens in your lands dream of having an empire.
Worship of your pantheon of gods has brought up further questions about spiritual forces in our world.
Your new skills in construction will surely help create venues for games and entertainment.
Your contact with other states has crystallized your ideas on governing your own people.
The glory of completing a wonder has energized your people. They are writing works to commemorate this great event.
With an Encampment now in place, we can formalize our military training.
Faced with the threat of invasion, your people are ready to come up with innovative defenses.
With plans to house many scrolls in the libraries of your campuses, your people begin to record the history of your empire.
The formation of a Religion by your Great Prophet inspires deeper thought on the nature of the divine.
Your victory at sea inspires your people to strive to become a naval power.
A system of lords and vassals is forming to manage all the farmlands of your empire.
Your large urban center will soon require a corps of bureaucrats.
With such a large standing army, you may want to consider adding mercenaries if your army needs to expand further.
The increase of commerce through your lands will soon attract a trade fair.
The success of your commercial districts has spurred the growth of trade guilds.
Your devout people believe strongly that your rule is a blessing from the divine.
The lessons you have learned from Caravel exploration have led to a new way of governing your people.
The inspiration provided by your newly-acquired Great Artist is awakening our people to the power of the individual.
The legwork to build an alliance has trained up your first corps of diplomats.
The growth of your Religion comes with the danger of schism. Reforming corrupt church practices better happen soon!
Your new Great Merchant is sharing ideas on how we can get the edge on our economic competitors.
The ideas from your great people have inspired intellectual discussion throughout the land.
Your new knowledge of the heavens is helping your navy navigate and establish a global empire.
Having constructed so many types of districts, your engineers have become skilled in city construction.
Your people believe in the just nature of this war. It has become an issue of national pride for us!
The unveiling of a new museum is drawing people to the arts. Perhaps dance and opera are next?
With a museum now ready to hold your findings, it is time to see what you can discover out in the natural world.
Your large city is getting overcrowded. It's time to start planning for some suburbs.
Modern warfare is clearly a brutal affair. Your military doctrine is starting to reflect some of these principles of total war.
The residents of your breathtaking new neighborhood clamor for a plan to conserve all the worldâ€™s natural treasures.
The advent of radio beckons the start of a new era of communication.
Your military is better organized. Now time to take your force to the world stage.
With stock exchanges springing up in several cities, investment capital is plentiful and a market economy is ready to emerge.
With a dedicated research lab in place, your initiative to recruit scientists into a nuclear research program can commence.
The women of your empire have clamored for proper sanitation. Having won that battle, they now need the right to vote.
The discipline instilled by your military academies is now second nature to your citizens.
Your factory workers clamor for better working conditions. It is time for the workers of the world to unite!
The advent of nuclear weaponry will surely change the nature of armed conflict across the globe.
Your 4 cites with Entertainment Complexes want to compete in a new professional sports league.
With a perfectly curated museum, your people's strong cultural heritage is on exhibit for all to see.
With air bases now spanning the globe, our military is ready to be deployed anywhere in the world at a moment's notice.
The unveiling of your new Spaceport has energized your people to push into space.
With so many airports in place, the world is truly becoming a smaller place.
Your advances in communications technology are allowing people to congregate online.
